exit

Exit from current Nelson application

Syntax

exit
exit(status)

Output argument

status

an optional integer value passed to the operating system as Nelsonâ€™s exit status code.

Description

exit terminates the current session of Nelson.

The default value is zero.

Example

Beware this example will close Nelson

exit(33)

See also

quit.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
